snippet: Harlem Désir, a member of the European Parliament and former leader of an antiracism organization, was designated Wednesday as the next leader of France’s governing Socialist Party, replacing Martine Aubry, who is stepping down.
abstract: Harlem Desir, a member of the European Parliament and former leader of an antiracism organization, is designated as the next leader of France’s governing Socialist Party, replacing Martine Aubry, who is stepping down.
lead_paragraph: Harlem Désir, a member of the European Parliament and former leader of an antiracism organization, was designated Wednesday as the next leader of France’s governing Socialist Party, replacing Martine Aubry, who is stepping down.

headline.main: France: New Leader Is Named for the Socialist Party
headline.print_headline: France: New Leader Is Named for the Socialist Party
